title: Why does my TalkBand B2 display cycling statistics even though I didn't ride a bicycle?
answer:
If you are driving, taking a bus, or in similar scenarios, your TalkBand B2 may mistakenly identify you as riding a bicycle because the statistics received by the acceleration sensor in these scenarios are similar to those when you are riding a bike. 

 Our R&D team is working hard on improving this feature to provide you with more accurate fitness statistics.
